entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 07 March 2023
